right.text: just print out something NASTY, a HUGE picture, i guess pain4 or lemonparty or something but if anyone has a better idea then that works too

and just give it the caption "HEY THIS PICTURE IS PRETTY FUCKING GROSS TOO"

title: we're all living in amerika, coca-cola, wonderbra
